track.name: Everyday I Have the Blues
comments: Hardly there will be people who do not recognize him as one of the leading guitarist of our time.

Beauty and grace are inherent in all his works. Refined implement his crazy ideas is amazing realism. The works of the masters are of woven pieces of thoughts and pieces of memories ... In his work there is symbolism that is inherent to high art.
better than good
so good
i can not get enough of B.B.
hard to believe this ol' fart is still rockin the blues!!  keep goin strong B.B.
que du bonheur!!!!!!!un pur regale pour les oreilles merci
i saw BB.King in England on the 2006 tour with Gary Moore. I drove a ~** long way to see him but it was a great concert.
testify
Wow.... this one is incredible.
Remember seein' this live at Manchester MEN a few years back... 81 years old, and the guy gave the best performance I've ever seen in my life.
like a train crawling along the tracks. pure  rhythm
But, Not today!
wow...whow
It's because of the blues that I don't have the other kind of blues more often!
without B B King everyday I would have the Blues !
exelente ,magnifico
excenlente
everyday
Let's dance!!!!  :)
